home.name: I'M JAVIER FRAY
home.title: FULL STACK DEVELOPER
home.subtitle: Building scalable, functional and high-impact solutions

about.title: ABOUT ME
about.subtitle: PLAYER PROFILE
about.bio: I am a developer with experience in full-stack development, able to work in all stages of application creation. From the implementation of modern interfaces to the design and optimization of server logic and structure.
about.bio2: I have participated in projects oriented to both end-users and internal systems, focusing on building scalable, functional and high-impact solutions.
about.bio3: I adapt to the needs of the project, always looking for a balance between technical efficiency, product quality and an effective user experience.
about.educationTitle: Superior Technologist in Automation and Instrumentation

portfolio.name: Portfolio
portfolio.description: Personal portfolio built with React, TypeScript, .NET, EntityFramework, and deployed with GitHub Actions.

pythonCrud.name: Python CRUD CLI Postgres
pythonCrud.description: Command line interface for CRUD operations with PostgreSQL, featuring bcrypt encryption and Docker.

reactPlaybook.name: React Playbook
reactPlaybook.description: React project with React Router Dom, Redux-toolkit, Standard linter, Vitejs, and Playwright testing.

bookList.name: Book Reading List
bookList.description: Book management application built with React, TypeScript, Redux-toolkit, React-query and Tailwind.

typescriptApi.name: TypeScript API + Redis
typescriptApi.description: REST API with TypeScript, Express, Redis caching, Swagger docs, Jest testing, and Docker deployment.

lambdaApi.name: Lambda Functions REST API
lambdaApi.description: Serverless REST API using AWS Gateway, Lambda Functions, MongoDB and Vue.js frontend.

flaskApi.name: Dockerized Flask REST API
flaskApi.description: Python Flask REST API with PyMongo, containerized with Docker and MongoDB.

productManagement.name: Product Management System
productManagement.description: Full-stack product management system with Docker, TypeScript, Express, JWT auth, and Vue.js.

altscore.title: Delivery Engineer
altscore.description: Spearheaded the end-to-end delivery of customized credit evaluation solutions, acting as the primary technical liaison for clients. Analyzed client needs and existing systems to design and implement optimal integration strategies.

dacodes.title: Software Engineer
dacodes.description: Developed an application to manage operator training for ATY (Agencia de Transportes de Yucatán) in Yucatán, Mexico. Collaborated closely with ATY's development team to deploy the application on their servers.

cacao.title: FrontEnd Developer
cacao.description: Contributed to developing a client's website using Shopify Dawn, improving speed and adding new functionalities. Led the implementation of the company's new website using modern frontend and backend technologies.

soluciones.title: FullStack Developer
soluciones.description: Collaborated on Nomina360—a robust web application streamlining human resources management. Automated complex tasks such as permissions, vacation tracking, and payroll.

monkeyd.title: FullStack Developer
monkeyd.description: Launched a comprehensive web application to enhance the student enrollment experience at ISPEDIB 'Martha Bucaram de Rolds', achieving a 70% reduction in processing time.
